comments:
This may be related to bug 138947.

I have installed the RSE SSH plugin from bug 138337.
I try to create a connection for ssh only. Hostname and systemtype are entered.
When I press finish on the Wizard's subsystems page, I get the following backtrace:

I no longer get this bug. Martin - can you still reproduce it?
Yes I think this is fixed.

Need to reopen. Just got this again.

It seems to be transient. Probably I got this because I wanted to create a connection in the local profile, that has the same name as an already existing connection from a Team shared profile (which was hidden and thus invisible).

It might make sense trying to reproduce this with the DOM attached to bug 142718 and trying to create a connection named "dev.eclipse.org" of type "SSH Only" and hostname "dev.eclipse.org" (which I think exists in the "Team" profile or in the "parser" profile).

The other reason why I'm getting this could probably be that I had an SSH/Gdbserver connection created, and stored, but then removed the corresponding plugin (See bug 138947).

As a followup on the other already known exception (NPE in getUserIdPreference), I also got this:
